thread.title: Peter Karla
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Peter Karla

author: Peter Karla
title: Peter Karla
text: Nothing but great things to say about Freeze Pro Shop. I ordered an Oakley Helmet/Goggle combo from them for significantly cheaper than I could find anywhere else. The next week my truck was stolen with my new gear inside of it. FPS matched the price I paid previously plus gave me an additional discount to help me out. I have since ordered from them again and they upgraded my shipping to make sure my ski poles would get here before my trip to the mountain this weekend. 5/5 stars all the way and will continue to do business with them!
